name: Sweet Land (BETA)
description:
This is a platform game with shooting in a candy kingdom in which you have to collect ingredients, kill enemies and stop a revolution that threatens our world.

The members of Juicy Games are:

  • Alison Cabrera: Main programmer.
  • Cristina Santainés: Main artist.
  • Ricard Llado: Secondary artist.
  • Diego Flores: Secondary artist, technical artis, secundary programer.
